headline: McDonald's, Starbucks, and other US chains could face anti-American pushback, Wall Street fears
summary: Store expansion and a comeback of the China market is the hope; tariff backlash could shutter that.

headline: 1 Dow Jones Stock to Target This Week and 2 to Keep Off Your Radar
summary: While the Dow Jones represents industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a safe bet. Some are facing headwinds like declining demand, rising costs, or disruptive new competitors.

raw.headline: 1 Dow Jones Stock to Target This Week and 2 to Keep Off Your Radar
raw.summary: While the Dow Jones represents industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a safe bet. Some are facing headwinds like declining demand, rising costs, or disruptive new competitors.

headline: Meet the Dow Jones Dividend Stock That Is Hovering Around an All-Time High Despite the Stock Market Sell-Off
summary: The stock market sell-off has intensified, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 both down over 10% from their recent highs and the Nasdaq Composite down over 20% as of this writing-- putting the growth-heavy index in a bear market.  In fact, fast-food giant McDonald's (NYSE: MCD) hit an all-time high in March and is up slightly year-to-date at the time of this writing.  Here's why the Dow Jones component is well positioned to endure tariffs and why the dividend stock could be worth buying now.
